=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Mocossmy Cross Nail Art Charms Decoration,72 PCS Gold Silver 3D Mini Metal Punk Vintage Cross Designs Mixed Types Retro Acrylic Nail Jewelry Accessories for Women Girls DIY Manicure Crafts Decoration
Review Date: 2022/05/23
Store: Mocossmy
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {}
Review Text: These charms arrived properly packaged! Very cute looking but unfortunately not very practical for me! It snags on my hair cuz of the size of it! I think they are really pretty but will have to put them to use on crafts or something!
Review Title: Cute but snags hair!
Rating: 4.0

Boiess Colognes Poppy mint For Moms, Babies & Kids | Natural Eau de Cologne | Clean & Fresh Scent | Children Fragrance For Soft & Sensitive Skin | Easy Use, Gentle on Baby | Size: 8.5 FL Oz
Boiess

This is labeled as babys cologne but omg it smells good enough for ALL to wear!!!  Its clean yet lightly floral!
Smells Soooo Good!!
Boiess Colognes Poppy mint For Moms, Babies & Kids | Natural Eau de Cologne | Clean & Fresh Scent | Children Fragrance For Soft & Sensitive Skin | Easy Use, Gentle on Baby | Size: 8.5 FL Oz
Boiess
{'Brand': 'Boiess', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Volume': '8 Fluid Ounces', 'Scent': 'Poppymint', 'Special Feature': 'Dermatoligist tested, Pediatrician tested, Clean, Natural, Cruelty Free, Plant based, Hypoallegenic', 'Package Dimensions': '6.38 x 2.17 x 2.17 inches; 8.5 Ounces', 'UPC': '860007057533', 'Country of Origin': 'Spain'}
I really am loving this brand!!! I have 2 different scents now and they are both clean and floral smelling! It says its for babies but me and my teenage daughters prefer this soft scent vs bath and body works!!! Now i just need to buy the 3rd scent mint poppy !
Smells soft and clean!!!
AIFAIFA 9Pcs Gel Nail Polish Set, Burgundy Nail Polish Kits Red Colors Soak Off UV/LED Nail Polish Set, Gel Polish with Base Coat & Glossy & Matte Top All-Season Salon Manicure Art Design Red

Mask is weird

Sotica
{'Package Dimensions': '9.26 x 5.95 x 0.83 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'CS-JM-8'}
Really impressed with these lashes they ACTUALLY WORK! I applied 2 layers of magnetic eyeliner and the lashes stuck on IMMEDIATELY!!! I also had no trouble when it was time to wash them off! I used my regular soap and whatever was left on my eyelids i wiped off with coconut oil! Super simple! Definitely recommend!
Works really good!

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Fragrance Preference:** Enjoys clean, fresh scents with floral notes, particularly lavender, appealing to a broad demographic.
  
- **Product Sensitivity:** Values gentle formulations suitable for children and sensitive skin, prioritizing safety and comfort in her choices.
  
- **Natural Ingredients:** Strong preference for natural, cruelty-free, and hypoallergenic products, reflecting a commitment to environmentally friendly practices. Recent concerns regarding ingredient transparency remain prominent.
  
- **Versatility:** Appreciates products aimed at children, engaging in bonding experiences with her daughters, showcasing a flexible consumer approach.
  
- **Quality Consideration:** Engages critically with products, prioritizing quality and effectiveness. Recent positive experiences with beauty items reinforce her focus on usability and performance.
  
- **Positive Engagement:** Open to trying offerings from trusted brands while maintaining a cautious stance on health and usability, evolving her approach towards self-care and beauty items.
  
- **Nail and Eye Care Interest:** Actively expanding her beauty care repertoire, showing significant interest in nail products and eye makeup. Despite finding certain decorative items visually appealing, she has noted practical issues that limit their functionality, indicating a discerning approach to product usability and quality.

Overall, this user is meticulous in her choices, prioritizing safety, natural ingredients, and effective performance while seeking enjoyable self-care experiences for herself and her children. She balances aesthetics and practicality, particularly in her expanding interest in nail art and crafts.
